segments.pli: “Tisso imā, bhikkhave, samaṇasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.

segments.pli: Vevaṇṇiyamhi ajjhupagato, parapaṭibaddhā me jīvikā, añño me ākappo karaṇīyoti—
segments.en: ‘I have secured freedom from class.’ ‘My livelihood is tied up with others.’ ‘My behavior should be different.’

segments.pli: imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso samaṇasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta dhamme paripūrenti.
segments.en: When these three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill seven things.

segments.pli: Santatakārī hoti santatavutti sīlesu, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpajjo hoti, anatimānī hoti, sikkhākāmo hoti, “idamatthan”tissa hoti jīvitaparikkhāresu, āraddhavīriyo ca viharati.
segments.en: Their deeds and behavior are always consistent with the precepts. They’re content, kind-hearted, and humble. They want to train. They use the necessities of life after reflecting on their purpose. They’re energetic.

segments.pli: Imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso samaṇasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ime satta dhamme paripūrentī”ti.
segments.en: When those three perceptions for ascetics are developed and cultivated they fulfill these seven things.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, when these three perceptions for ascetics are developed…

suttaplex.blurb: Three ascetic perceptions lead to seven results.
